thread.title: Chili's lifts ban on 'Office' character Pam Beesly
thread.title_full: Chili's lifts ban on 'Office' character Pam Beesly

author: USA TODAY
title: Chili's lifts ban on 'Office' character Pam Beesly
text:
Chili's lifts ban on 'Office' character Pam Beesly Pam Beesly can again hang her head high in Chili's. Post to Facebook Chili's lifts ban on 'Office' character Pam Beesly Pam Beesly can again hang her head high in Chili's.  //usat.ly/2k2XAyt   Chili's lifts ban on 'Office' character Pam Beesly USA Today Network Sean Rossman , USA TODAY 9:07   Jenna Fischer as Pam Beesly in "The Office." (Photo: Chris Haston, NBC)   
Pam Beesly can again hang her head high in Chili's. 
The company lifted its 11-year-ban on "The Office" character on Tuesday, ensuring more "second drink" for her years to come. 
In one of the show's more famous scenes, a buzzed Beesly wins the Dundee Award for whitest sneakers. She famously proclaimed, "I feel God in this Chili's tonight," in her acceptance speech followed by an emphatic scream. 
She was later kicked out of the Scranton, Penn., restaurant after falling off a barstool. The manager said Beesly was sneaking drinks. He added , "She is not welcome at this restaurant chain ever again." 
Beesly owes her Chili's access to the actress who played Beesly, Jenna Fischer. On Monday, she tweeted a photo of herself in front of a Chili's with the question, "Should I try to go in?" The next day, Chili's issued a news release, announcing the ban was no longer. Should I try to go in? pic.twitter.com/HDpPqzA0by — Jenna Fischer (@jennafischer) February 6, 2017 
"After reviewing the good conduct of Pam, I have decided to lift the now 11-year ban," said President of Chili's Kelli Valade. "Pam is an inspiration to many and we welcome her with open arms." BREAKING: Chili’s lifts permanent ban on Pam ( @JennaFischer ), welcomes her back to any #Chilis restaurant: https://t.co/jw76381O8K — Chili's Grill & Bar (@Chilis) February 7, 2017 OMG! Second drink!!! https://t.co/xGGM78iaX6 — Jenna Fischer (@jennafischer) February 7, 2017 
Follow Sean Rossman on Twitter: @SeanRossman   Read or Share this story: http://usat.ly/2k2XAyt NEVER MISS OUT Life Be a pop culture maven. Get the news, reviews and the juiciest celebrity stories that keep you in the know, Monday-Friday. THANKS FOR SIGNING UP FOR THE Life NEWSLETTER 
We're sorry.
